about_the_game:
Set in a world torn apart by global conflict caused by major powers, players take on the role of soldiers from two different teams. Engage in intense multiplayer battles as you strive to defeat enemy forces and emerge victorious.

Key Features


  • Immerse yourself in thrilling battles on a dynamic battlefield.
  • Customize your weapons with a variety of attachments to suit your play style.
  • Experience the excitement of conquest gameplay, where strategic objectives must be achieved to secure victory.

Prepare yourself for the challenges that await in Sahara Storms WWIII.

Character Classes

Choose a character class that matches your preferred play style and bring your unique abilities to the battlefield.

  • Medic Class: Equipped with medical supplies, the Medic class plays a crucial role in providing healing support to teammates.

  • Support Class: As a Support class soldier, your role is to provide essential ammunition support to your team.

  • Assault Class: The Assault class is a versatile frontline unit, known for their intelligence and adaptability with their speed and ammuniation support.

Weapon Customization

Upgrade and customize your weapons using attachments to enhance your performance in combat.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that may not be appropriate for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: amd Ryzen 7 3700x / Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or MD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: amd ryzen 9 5900/ Intel Core i9-10900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or MD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
